channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Rescued sea turtle returned to ocean after treatment
item.description: Pennywise, a large sea turtle that was found injured along the Florida coast in May following a boat strike, has been returned to the ocean.

item.title: Small earthquake rattles parts of New York City area, New Jersey
item.description: A small earthquake rattled the New York City area Saturday night, according to the the U.S. Geological Survey.

item.title: Earthquake in Bergen County shakes parts of New Jersey, New York
item.description: An earthquake in Hasbrouck Heights, Bergen County, shook parts of New Jersey and New York on Saturday night.

item.description: A manhunt is intensifying for the gunman who allegedly killed a bartender and three patrons at a bar in southwestern Montana, authorities said.
